AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Sea Vipers berserker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: While [PAWN_nameDef] was a fairly low ranking member of the Sea Vipers, [PAWN_pronoun] was quite well known for [PAWN_possessive] combat prowess. Preferring to dual wield axes, [PAWN_nameDef] would frequently enter a battle frenzy, showing complete disregard for any life threatening wounds [PAWN_pronoun] may be suffering from.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Sea Vipers brigand
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: As a lowly brigand, [PAWN_nameDef] was simply one of many in the Sea Vipers. Equiped with a two handed weapon and leather armour, [PAWN_possessive] survival in raids was entirely dependent on [PAWN_possessive] skills, which must have been been reasonably alright.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Sea Vipers butcher
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Once a former pirate, [PAWN_nameDef] decided to enlist into the Sea Vipers, and hopefully fight for a good cause for once. Things didn't qutie turn out as [PAWN_nameDef] had hoped, as [PAWN_pronoun] had quickly regressed to setting buildings aflame.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Sea Vipers charger
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: While not overly skilled with magic, [PAWN_nameDef] did know how to channel lightning through [PAWN_possessive] maul, creating impacts that left anyone nearby both literally and figuratively shocked. This talent earnt [PAWN_nameDef] a place in the Sea Vipers, though didn't exactly earn [PAWN_objective] a high rank.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Sea Vipers cutthroat
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Due to being rather light on [PAWN_possessive] feet, [PAWN_nameDef] was often sent into enemy camps before the rest of the Sea Vipers arrived. [PAWN_possessive] sole purpose, to take down a few key members, and then slip into the shadows.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Sea Vipers duelist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Always quick on [PAWN_possessive] feet, [PAWN_nameDef] would glide throughout the battlefield, swiftly taking down anyone that got in [PAWN_possessive] way.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Sea Vipers enforcer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_possessive] was used to taking a beating, and put [PAWN_possessive] experience to good use in the Sea Vipers. [PAWN_nameDef] would take on large groups all by [PAWN_objective]self, letting [PAWN_possessive] allies regroup and continue the assault.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Sea Vipers marine
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: As a rather high ranking soldier in the Sea Vipers, [PAWN_possessive] was one of the marines sent in to finish the assault. Sometimes this was after the initial attack had weakened their target, and sometimes [PAWN_nameDef] was the initial attack.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Sea Vipers strongarm
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was among some of the more feared members of the Sea Vipers. Even on the off chance [PAWN_pronoun] was disarmed, [PAWN_nameDef] would just continue onwards, crushing anyone in [PAWN_possessive] path.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Sea Vipers sharpshooter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was well known for [PAWN_possessive] keen eyee, and steady hands. These two traits made [PAWN_possessive] an obvious pick for the Sea Vipers, who were in dire need of archers. [PAWN_nameDef] would be taking down targets before the others were even ready to launch the assualt.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Sea Vipers vanquisher
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was equally skilled with both short blades and javelins, which made [PAWN_objective] quite an asset to the Sea Vipers. Anyone trying to run away, and alert anyone else nearby, would quickly fall to the ground, with a javelin buried in their back.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Sea Vipers healer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: There were always many injured Sea Vipers at the end of a battle, and [PAWN_nameDef] would always try to tend to them all, no matter the state they were in.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Sea Vipers mender
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: As a rather skilled restoration mage, [PAWN_nameDef] was an invaluable asset to the Sea Vipers, as an unsuccessful raid on Summerset would result in many casualties.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Sea Vipers serpent lord
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: The Sea Vipers made great use of sea serpents during battles, and [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the many in charge of them. A highly important job, as an enraged sea serpent didn't particularly care which ship it went after.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Sea Vipers pyromancer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a rather skilled fire mage, that was quite fond of the smell of wood burning. A rather dangerous combination when at sea, but a deadly one during a battle. [PAWN_nameDef] would keep [PAWN_objective]self busy setting things on fire, while the other Sea Vipers were taking down anyone putting up a fight.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Sea Vipers tempest
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] would send bolts of lightning flying whenever the battle began. While [PAWN_pronoun] would often miss, the loud shocks of each impact would cause a great deal of confusion, giving [PAWN_possessive] fellow Sea Vipers a nice advantage.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Sea Vipers chillrender
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef], as a somewhat skilled ice mage, would create large walls of ice, seperating groups of foes, allowing [PAWN_possessive] fellow Sea Vipers to easily take them down.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Sea Vipers commander
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] commanded a small band of soldiers, whose sole task was to undertake ground assaults, while the Armada kept the main enemy forces distracted. [PAWN_nameDef] took great pride in [PAWN_possessive] soldiers work, and always treated them to a nice meal afterwards, no matter the outcome.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Sea Vipers captain
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef], started off captaining a pirate crew, a crew which made quite a name for itself. Eventually [PAWN_pronoun] caught the eye of the Admiral of the Sea Vipers, and was given the opportunity to join the Armada, retaining full control of [PAWN_possessive] ship and crew in the process. [PAWN_nameDef] quickly accepted, under a few conditions of course.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Sea Vipers commodore
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Many moons ago, [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the commodores of the Sea Vipers. [PAWN_pronoun] commanded several ships in the Sea Vipers, and was considered quite a tactical genius. Sadly even [PAWN_possessive] intellect wasn't enough to capture Summerset, and [PAWN_nameDef] wound up stepping down after yet another failed invasion.
